SpellCardsRule.NAME: Spell Card Rule Manual
SpellCardsRule.FLAVOR: A mysterious power keeps Spell Card Rule's work.
DESCRIPTIONS: With this, you can use the #ySpell #yCard #yRule. #yActivate : get a SP card.(Limit #b1 time each turn).
I don't have enough P point.
I already got a SP card.

KomeijisEye.NAME: Satori's Eye
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, you will gain buff based on enemy's #bIntents. (It will be of no effect at the first turn).

Grimoire.NAME: Grimoire
Grimoire.FLAVOR: A precious book that fills you up with magic power.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain #b1 Orb slot.

MigarariNingyou.NAME: Sacrificial Doll
MigarariNingyou.FLAVOR: The damage taken by the possessor will be partially taken by this gratitude evoking doll.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, get #b1 #yShield #yDoll.

SteinsOfFate.NAME: Gem of Fate
SteinsOfFate.FLAVOR: This scarlet gem is affecting your fate somehow...
DESCRIPTIONS: Draw an extra card at the start of your turn. Gain #1 count whenever an enemy dies. #yActivate : use #1 count to draw #b1 card.

ThirstyCross.NAME: Bloodlusting Cross
ThirstyCross.FLAVOR: You can't get rid of it. Whether itself, or the thirst it brings, the thirst of blood...
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with #b2 #yStrength . If you didn't use any #yAttack in #b1 turn, lose #b
HP at the end of the turn.
Start each combat with #b2 #yStrength . If you didn't use any #yAttack in #b1 turn, gain #b
#rBloodBruise at the end of the turn.

ReiryokuShyu.NAME: Spirit Orb
ReiryokuShyu.FLAVOR: When you are enegetic, this gem will radiate softly.
DESCRIPTIONS: At start of your turn, if you have at least #b4 #rP point, gain [E] .

SpellExtend.NAME: Spell Card Extend
SpellExtend.FLAVOR: SP card in it will suddenly appear in Spell Card Rule Manual ready to be used...
DESCRIPTIONS: If you have at least #b2 #rP point,you can choose from #b5 cards when choose SP card.

ShirouKen.NAME: Hakurou Sword
ShirouKen.FLAVOR: A youkai forged sword that cuts away hesitation.
DESCRIPTIONS: In #b1 turn, each #yAttack you used will make all following #yAttacks' damage increase #1 .

LinkosWocchi.NAME: Reverse Watch
LinkosWocchi.FLAVOR: Several words are carved on its back: As long as you keep pushing beyond yourself, there will be light in the front.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yActivate : If it's in your turn, make ALL unit's HP return back to the amount last turn, it is of no effect to the dead or Minion.(Limited #b1 time per combat)

KyoryuNoHagoromo.NAME: Divine Raiment of the Dragon Fish
KyoryuNoHagoromo.FLAVOR: A wind and lightning bolt repelling raiment of dragon fish.

KoishisEye.NAME: Closed Satori's Eye
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with #b5 #yStrength and #yDexterity . You can no longer see enemy #bIntents and ALL units' status.

JyouHari.NAME: Cleansed Crystal Mirror
JyouHari.FLAVOR: By looking into the mirror, they see all your past deeds.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, enemy will gain debuff based on its #bIntents in last turn.

WordlessDocument.NAME: Wordless Document
WordlessDocument.FLAVOR: There is no word on it, but a signet with: the Ministry of Right and Wrong...
DESCRIPTIONS: You can feel something peculiar about it,but you can't tell what it is...

CrystalBall.NAME: Crystal Ball
CrystalBall.FLAVOR: By pouring mana into this,you can use elemental magics easily.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yActivate : If you have no #yElement #yOrb , choose #b1 and obtain (Except Luna and Sun). Otherwise choose #b1 #yElement #yOrb to #yResonance.(Cooling for #b1 turn)

FamiliarSpoon.NAME: Familiar Spoon
DESCRIPTIONS: When you stare at this spoon, there is someone emerge in your mind...

BookofPenglai.NAME: Mysterious Book
BookofPenglai.FLAVOR: There is no word on its cover...
DESCRIPTIONS: The remaining pages are all blank...
The long awaited paradise will open the gate.'
It says: This no longer has practical effect,keep it only as a souvenir.
Right click to browse this book...

NitorisBag.NAME: General Service Bag
NitorisBag.FLAVOR: There are various items in the bag,you can assemble them optionally.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yActivate : create #b1 card and add to your draw pile.(Limited #b1 time per combat)
Deal 6 Static damage to a random enemy.
Deal 5 Static damage to ALL enemies.
Apply 3 Weak to a random enemy.
Apply 3 Vulnerable to a random enemy.
Deal 12 Static damage to a random enemy.
Deal 10 Static damage to ALL enemies.
Apply 3 Weak and Vulnerable to a random enemy.
Deal 18 Static damage to a random enemy.
Deal 15 Static damage to ALL enemies.
Apply 3 Weak, Vulnerable and Frail to ALL enemies.

MysticStaff.NAME: Staff
MysticStaff.FLAVOR: Formidable magician can conjure without tool. But to those new magicians, they can only ues senior magic with a staff.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yActivate : add #b1 Spell Card to your hand. This card base on #b2 next #yElement orb.(Limit #b1 time each turn)
I don't have enough Element orb.

ColorfulQuillpen.NAME: Colorful Quill-pen
ColorfulQuillpen.FLAVOR: This miraculous quill-pen can rewrite the Manual partially...
DESCRIPTIONS: #yActivate : refresh the Spell Card you can choose.(Limited #b1 time each turn)
I don't need to use it now.

RingOfDollmaker.NAME: Ring of Dollmaker
RingOfDollmaker.FLAVOR: It's almost a essential tool to Dollmakers. Even a Dollmaker attained perfection in skill, he still will use it.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yActivate : fill your slot with #yDoll. At most #3.(Limited #b1 time per combat)

GoodDreamPillow.NAME: Dream Soul Pillow
GoodDreamPillow.FLAVOR: A pillow made using Dream Soul as its model. It's very, very soft, sleeping on it will be very comfortable.
DESCRIPTIONS: Can make you have a good dream. A tag on it write:
Seems like it won't work anymore, but still it is very comfortable.

Clue.NAME: Slip of Paper
Clue.FLAVOR: The handwriting on it is quite illegible
DESCRIPTIONS: #yActivate : See the content on the slip.

MiracleMallet.NAME: Miracle Mallet
MiracleMallet.FLAVOR: This mallet sends out a ominous bewitchment...
DESCRIPTIONS: #yActivate : #bStrengthen a random card from draw pile/hand/discard pile, and make it #yExhaust . It will restore when combat ends.(Every combat limit #b1 time)
You can sense this mallet is crying for its lost owner...

MusicBox.NAME: Music Box
MusicBox.FLAVOR: A attaching label: I want give you a gift before we meet. It seems indicate something?
DESCRIPTIONS: Right click to switch. If active, it will play music in some conditions.

Memoirist.NAME: Memoirist
Memoirist.FLAVOR: In fact it's a novel, but you can find some fragmentary memories of its author from it.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yActivate : Choose #b1 #yAssociation card in your hand, transform it to a appointed associate card.

HoshigumaDish.NAME: Hoshiguma Dish
HoshigumaDish.FLAVOR: It raises the quality of any sake poured into it, but the quality will reduce as time goes.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yActivate : Choose #b1 card in your hand, transform it to a random card. Strengthen and add it into your discard pile. It will be weaken every turn.(Every combat limit #b1 time)

CrystalOfMemory.NAME: Crystal Of Memory
CrystalOfMemory.FLAVOR: A cluster of crystals which seems have vitality.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose 1 card from your deck, get effect bases on thar card.
Future card rewards have #b1 additional card to choose from.
You can see enemy #bIntents and ALL units' status again.
At start of turn, if you have #yShield #yDoll , #ySpear #yDoll and #yArcher #yDoll , gain [E] .
When you draw, deal #b3 damage to a random enemy.
Whenever you blocked attack, gain #b3 #yBlock at start of next turn.
Whenever you gain #yBlock , deal #b1 damage to a random enemy.
Apply #b1 #yBound #ySpirit to a random enemy at start of turn..
Gain extra #b15 gold when you win a combat.
Gain #b8 Block at end of your turn, whenever you played #b1 #yAttack , reduce by #b1 .
Record #yElement you played. If you play an #yElement is interpromoting with record, trigger its #bResonance (without exhaust element). If restriction, clear the record.
Your applied #yWeak and #yVulnerable will increase by #b1 .
#yActivate : Choose #b1 card in your hand, make a copy and add into discard pile.(Limited #b1 time per combat)
#yActivate : Add #b1 random card into your hand, it cost #b0 this turn.(Limited #b1 time per combat)
If you didn't be attacked, draw #b1 card at start of next turn.
At start of turn, a random unit lose or heal #b2 hp.
If you didn't play any #yAttack , gain #b1 #yStrength at start of next turn.
When a enemy with #yAbnormity attack you, you heal #b1 hp.
Whenever you played #b4 #yAttack , your ALL attack cards' damage in crease by #b1 .
Whenever you shuffle your discard pile, choose #b1 card in exhaust pile, add it into your discard pile.
Whenever you played #b3 #ySkill , upgrade #b1 random card in your hand.
